name: Match PET Mania
description:
Match PET Mania is the theme of pet’s game. Bring you fresh and excellent challenges! Welcome to amazing pet match game!
Switch and match specific pet as many as you can to defeat evil spiders.
With Pet Match you can experience brilliant effects and definitely make you to experience pleasure time!
Features:
• Enjoy amazing and deluxe boosters
• Switch and match pets and animals in this forest paradise
• Swap and match adorable pets
• Start your puzzle adventure journey with dogs, cats, panda and pets.
